text: "Baby Don't Forget My Number" is a popular dance hit song by the music group Milli Vanilli. It was released in December 1988. It was the first of Milli Vanilli's three #1 hits on the Billboard Hot 100 between 1988-1990. The longest cut is eight minutes and 20 seconds. Category:1988 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Milli Vanilli songs
title: Baby Don't Forget My Number
